xdsl_modem_wifi_config_ssid_too_short: The network ID must be at least 2 characters long.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_ssid_too_long: The network ID must contain a maximum of 32 characters.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_ssid_wrong_chars: The network ID cannot contain accents.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_type_changed: Changing the security type requires encoding a new password.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_key_too_short: The WiFi key must contain at least 6 characters.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_description: WiFi mode allows you to configure the modemâ€™s wireless network for your wireless hardware to connect to.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_ssid_tooltip: The network ID (or SSID in technical terms) is the name that will be broadcast and displayed as an available wireless network near your modem.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_ssid_advertisemen: The network ID (name) can be publicly visible or hidden. If hidden, you need to know the name of your network in order to access it, as it will not appear in the list of available wireless networks.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_security_tooltip: The level of security depends on the encryption type and strength of the password required to access your wireless network. It is recommended that you use WPA and WPA2 using higher encryption.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_key_tooltip: The WiFi key is the password that will be required to access your wireless network. It is a good idea to enter a complex key, i.e. containing letters AND numbers, with upper and lower case letters.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_canal_tooltip: The range of available channels corresponds to different frequencies. There is no particular recommendation between choosing between one channel or another.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_key_not_matching: The WiFi keys do not match.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_really: Are you sure you want to change your WiFi configuration?
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_success_single: WiFi configuration successfully updated. You will be redirected.
xdsl_modem_wifi_read_error: Oops! We were unable to retrieve your WiFi information.
xdsl_modem_wifi_write_error: Oops! We were unable to update your WiFi.
xdsl_modem_wifi_config_info: A WiFi network configuration change is already in progress. The changes you make will be applied once this change is complete.
